A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just another rehash of plot lines from the original trilogy.  Pretty clear that Disney is so mortified by the stink of the prequels that it is not taking risks with this trilogy and that's too bad for those us that fell in love with the rich star wars universe created by Lucas.  So many new themes and planets to explore!  For that\, stick with Rogue One\, a much better film.  \n\nZero character development outside of Kylo Ren. One strength of Force Awakens was JJ introducing these new characters that we great to care about but Johnson does very little to flesh them out.  Also\, some of the comedy was good\, but the timing was inappropriate.  Am I supposed to be afraid of the First Order or laugh at them?  Is this a serious fight for the galaxy or not? I left the theater disappointed and not very interested in what will happen to these characters in episode 9.
